channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Graffiti outside Vodafone - rye lane, 19th December
item.description:
Please clean off

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Rye Lane, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The meat markets are dumping a huge amount of wooden pallets, 19th December
item.description:
It's nearly impossible to walk this section of Rye Lane due to the amount of flytipped wooden pallets from the meat and fish markets. Please remove them all and enforce against them doing this. Looks terrible, hinders walking space. It's their responsibility to deal with their own waste, not for us to manage and pay the council to pick up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 30, Rye Lane, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped again, 19th December
item.description:
Constantly flytipped, how many times have I Reported it this year?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Coleman Road, Lower Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter, 19th December
item.description:
Hello is there anyway we can replace the 3 bins in Churchfield Rec with ones that the foxes can’t get into? Every single day the bins litter is strewn all over the park, including plenty of dog poo bags. The amount of extra work this is causing the council and the mess it makes of the park, is far from ideal thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Betts Close, Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping in Electricity building on Towerhill Road, 19th December
item.description:
Fly tipping of general rubbish over the fence of the electricity building in Towerhill Road. Rubbish is increasing, so it seems someone is dumping regularly. Food is rotting and smells and Rat sightings have increased with the volume of rubbish
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tower Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
